physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe restrictive ventilatory defect and decreased diffusing capacity were noted on pulmonary function testing. Laboratory values indicated a white-cell count of 3.6 per cubic millimeter, a hemoglobin level of 11.1 g per deciliter, and a platelet count of 82 per cubic millimeter.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's respiratory status declined precipitously and he died of treatment-refractory hypoxemia. An autopsy confirmed severe, diffuse pulmonary fibrosis.
